Model.BugReport

Class DeveloperAssignmentService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.BugReport.DeveloperAssignmentService

  • public class DeveloperAssignmentService
extends java.lang.Object
    Class creates a service that is responsible for assigning developers to bug reports. Also contains checkers for assignment of developers by users.

    • Method Detail

      • assignDeveloperToBugReport

        public void assignDeveloperToBugReport(User user,
                                       Developer developer,
                                       BugReport bugReport)
                                throws ReportErrorToUserException
        Assigns a developer to the given bug report.
        Parameters:
        user - The user requesting the assignment
        developer - The developer to be assigned to the bug report
        bugReport - The bug report to which to assign the developer
        Throws:
        ReportErrorToUserException - Assigning the developer to the specified bug report caused an error.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - One of the given arguments is null.

      • canUserAssignDeveloperToBugReport

        public boolean canUserAssignDeveloperToBugReport(User user,
                                                 Developer developer,
                                                 BugReport bugReport)
        Checker to check if the user has te permission to assign the developer to the bug report
        Parameters:
        user - The user requesting the assignment
        developer - The developer to be assigned to the bug report
        bugReport - The bug report to which to assign the developer
        Returns:
        True if the user has the valid permissions to assign the developer to the bug report or bug report has permanent tag..
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - One of the given arguments is null.

      • canUserAssignDevelopers

        public boolean canUserAssignDevelopers(User user,
                                       BugReport bugReport)
        Checker to check if the user has te permission to assign developers to the bug report
        Parameters:
        user - The user requesting the assignment
        bugReport - The bug report to which the user wishes to assign developers.
        Returns:
        True if the user has the valid permissions to assign developers to the bug report.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - One of the given arguments is null.
